軍事通行権の取り消し
統率値が最大の§Y$MAX$§Wに達しているため、これ以上は蓄積されません。\n
そして、それらの衛星国と自治領です。\n
我々は平和条約で軍拡を制限されているため、新規に軍事ユニットを作成できません。
生活必需品はある程度は満たされています
来月中には$VAL$§W変化する見込みです。
$POPTYPE$は§G$VALUE$§W点の研究点を算出しています。\n（人口の§Y$FRACTION$%§W、$OPTIMAL$が最適値です。）
防御する技術を持っていない相手への毒ガス攻撃は、壊滅的な被害を与えられるでしょう。
毒ガス攻撃が使用可能です\n
毒ガス攻撃への防衛が可能です\n
ナショナルフォーカスは全て使用中です。
退却が可能になるまで、あと§Y$VAL$§W日必要です。
ここにはまだ入植できません
我々の軍隊が彼らの国内に存在しています。
誰も投票権を有していません。
このPOPはこの旅団を回復させるには規模が小さすぎます。
このPOPは§Y$VAL$§Wの人口を有し、§Y$ALLOWED$§W個の旅団を編制可能です。現在、§Y$CURRENT$§W個の旅団が存在しています。
予備役の損耗のため、このユニットは§Y$VAL$%§Wの速度で回復中です。
動員されたユニットは、§Y50%§Wの速度で回復します。
人々が$CULTURE_GROUP_UNION$の同胞の統一を訴えるようになり、文化ナショナリズムが$COUNTRY$で吹き荒れています。併合の嘆願を行ったとしても、彼らがそれに反対することはほとんどありえないでしょう。
昨今の民族主義感情の高まりを受けて、$FROMCOUNTRY_ADJ$政府は$CAPITAL$にある我々の政府当局に対して$COUNTRY$永久連合に加入する意思を正式に出しました。この動きに反対する動きは殆ど見られません。
謹んでお断り申し上げます、$FROMCOUNTRY_ADJ$のクソ野郎
あの§Y国家§Wを屈服させ、国際社会の場で装っている文明人の仮面を全て剥ぎ取ってやり、抱いている野心をがっつり削ぎ落としてやりましょう。
$RECIPIENT$を封じ込めるために、かの国の領土、威信、軍事力を削ぎ落としてください。
§Y$COUNTRY$§Wが§Y$TYPE$§Wとして解放されるように要求しますか？\n §Y$COUNTRY$§Wは以下の§Y$NUM$§W個の州を受け取ります：§Y$PROVINCES$§W
我々の国家は王家の谷における考古学発掘調査で先導的な立場にあります。
ガリバルディの赤シャツ隊

The Redshirts (Camicie rosse) was the name given to the volunteers who served under Giuseppe Garibaldi during his struggles to forge a nation state out of the many splintered Italian states, thus aptly named on account of the red shirts that Garibaldi and his men had taken to wearing. The charismatic Garibaldi, vastly popular both at home and abroad, and generally seen as a freedom fighter, was instrumental in securing Italian Unification under the Sardinian Crown. These Italian Pan-Nationalists fight for the Unification of Italy.

$MONARCHTITLE$! News have just reached us that renowned Italian freedom fighter Giuseppe Garibaldi and his 'Expedition of The Thousand' have broken and taken control of the government in $FROMCOUNTRY$. Everywhere this rugged freedom fighter goes jubilant crowds of Italians turn out to greet him -- waving the tricolor of the Italian nation -- as the liberator of all of Italy. On account of our dominant position on the peninsula, the newly formed government in $FROMCOUNTRY$ sends word that they accept $COUNTRY$'s natural position as the foremost among equals of the newly formed Italy.
Who is this man, and what does he want from me?
This Casus Belli allows us to demand:
Trade for this goods type is automated. turn off automation to change setting
Automate the trade for this goods type
We are currently researching §Y$TECH$§W.\nAt the present pace, the project should be completed on §Y$DATE$§W.
Force an §Yuncivilized country§W to secede territory to form a colonial concession.
Demand that $RECIPIENT$ secede territory to form a colonial concession.
Annex an §Yuncivilized country§W by forcing them to become a protectorate of ours.
Annex $RECIPIENT$ by establishing a protectorate over them.
Liberate core territory of our §YCultural Union§W
Liberate core territory of our §YCultural Union§W.
$VAL$ have signed up to be $WHO$ in $WHERE$ recently.
彼らは我々の§Y$TYPE$§Wであり、すでにその§Y影響圏§W化にあります。

以前に述べたように、兵士POPが反乱を起こした場合、そのPOP出身者によって編成された旅団も反乱に加わります。もし旅団の人口アイコンの隣に反乱派閥アイコンが表示されている場合、それは旅団の出身POPが反乱に参加していることを表します。これは非常に危険です。このPOPの状態や、何がPOPの関心事なのかなどをチェックする方法の一つは、ユニット画面のPOPアイコンをクリックして、人口画面を開くことです。とりあえず、チュートリアルを続けるため、「次へ」をクリックしてください。

The prices are set globally each day on the World Market as a function of supply and demand. The current supply and demand will set a target price which the actual price will gradually close in on, you should keep an eye on the development of prices on goods that are important to you. Are Small Arms going up, perhaps its time to build a new factory. The arrow next to the price indicates whether prices are rising (green), remaining steady (yellow) or falling (red). Click 'Next' to continue

The image below illustrates the world market entry for clipper convoys. The icons in the bottom row indicate whether we are currently selling or buying the good, and whether trading is currently set to AI automation or not. The government (the player or the AI) can buy and sell on the market in two ways, either by setting trade orders or by automatic trades generated through other actions in the game. Click the Icon for Clipper Convoys to see an automatic Trade.

At least §Y$NUM$§W% of the population need to be Bureaucrats of an accepted Culture. Current ratio is §Y$CURR$§W%

ニューランズ決議はフランシス・G・ニューランズ議員にちなんで名付けられたアメリカ合衆国議会が1898年に可決した共同決議であり、ハワイ共和国を合衆国に併合しハワイ準州を設立するというものでした。
イオニア諸島はナポレオン戦争の終結以降、イギリスの友好的な保護国でした。1862年、保護国の維持には費用がかかると判断され、2年に渡る交渉の末、諸島はギリシャに引き渡されました。

Release a §Ycountry§W from its sovereign nation
Rebel Factions are organizing in our country!

§Y$NUM$§W have arrived our nation from other countries this month

After the events of the Crimean War Russia had begun believing that it could not hope to protect its North American possessions in the event of another war with Britain, and had begun considering a sale of what was to become the U.S. state of Alaska. The territory was bought by the United States in 1867 at the price of 2.3 cents per acre. The Alaska purchase was widely derided in the American press of the day as 'Seward's Icebox' after then Secretary of State William H. Seward, at whose initiative the purchase was made.

The feelers put out by Eduard Andreevich Stoeckl, chargé d'affaires at our embassy in Washington, have had results, as The United States has today offered to enter into negotiations over a proposed sale of our territories in North America. The Americans are offering us a price of 2.3 cents per acre for the Alaskan territories, and that price seems relatively fair. The colonies could become hard to defend in the event of war with the United Kingdom, so getting rid of them for a price now might not be such a bad idea. What say you, $MONARCHTITLE$?
We have more bad climate than we need anyway
No, I don't think so. Maybe we could build a bridge there someday?
$MONARCHTITLE$, Russia has agreed to sell Alaska to us!
$MONARCHTITLE$, negotiations with Russia over a sale of the Alaska territory have stranded, and Russia has declined to sell us the territory.

A Sepoy, from the Persian 'Siphai', meaning soldier, was a term generally applied to indian soldiers in the service of a European Power. In 1857 a number of Sepoys employed by the British East India Company rose in rebellion against British rule in what has been called both 'The Sepoy Rebellion' and 'India's First War of Independence'. Rebelling Sepoys fight for Indian Freedom from colonial rule.

Banks will only loan you money if you have been meeting your interest payments and are not hostile. Foreign banks will also never loan you more than $MAXLOAN$% of their total available funds for security reasons.
Total score of nation relative to our total score
We cannot have more than §Y$MAX$§W influence in a single nation
We gain §Y$NUM$§W influence in §Y$COUNTRY$§W each day. Our base influence gain is §Y$BASE$§W
We are not allowed to declare war against §Ysatellites§W or §Ydominions§W

While Germany was not united until the proclamation of the German Empire, following the Franco-Prussian war, rising nationalism in the 19th century had meant that unification had been on the cards long before that, with the Frankfurt assembly of 1848 being an important forerunner. By achieving a dominant position among the South German states, we can form the South German Confederation.
End the war by reuniting our nation under a common banner again.

News reaches us from $FROMCOUNTRY$ that the local ruling elites have thrown our ambassador out of the country, and that their troops are laying siege to our embassy with apparent intent to enforce that decision. This affair is developing into an enormous loss of international face, one which can only be avoided through a formal declaration of war against $FROMCOUNTRY$. Sire, how should we respond?
Perhaps we should let the $FROMCOUNTRY_ADJ$ Dragon sleep.
Annex a foreign §Ycountry§W all provinces of which are your cores.

Liberal Jacobin Rebels strive for the inclusion of broader stratas of the population in the government of the nation. In an absolute monarchy they will rise to impose a constitutional monarchy, whereas they in all other cases seek to establish a democracy.
